text: Domestic terrorism refers to a form of terrorism committed by a country's citizen in his or her own country. ==Examples== * Charlie Hebdo shooting * * * * * * * 2025 Pahalgam Massacre * * * * * Pittsburgh synagogue shooting * * * * 2025 D.C. Jewish museum shooting * * * * * ==Related pages== * Islamic terrorism * White nationalism * Genocidal massacre ==References== Category:Terrorism Category:Crimes against humanity Category:Public safety
title: Domestic terrorism
